properties.Name: Te Atamira (Tīrama Mai Stage)
properties.Description: Fire shows, aerial performances, DJ and live music every night from 7pm to 9pm.

properties.Name: Tahurangi (Lighting the trees)
properties.Description: Lighting up the back drop to the stage, three large trees will illuminate the entrance to Cathedral Square.

properties.Name: Whakamaramatia te Pō (Lighting the old post office)
properties.Description: Magical projection bringing the Old Post Office Building to life.

properties.Name: Ngā Whetū, Ngā Manu (Matariki star lanterns)
properties.Description: A series of lanterns representing all 10 of the stars visible in the South Island as part of the Matariki Constellation.

properties.Name: Te Ataata (Lighting the trees)
properties.Description: Amazing lighting display making the Old Post Office Building glow with colour.

properties.Name: Kaihōpara o Ngā Pūtaiao (Explore with Otago Museum)
properties.Description: Lasers, lenses, luminous chemicals and more! Get hands-on with the science of light! Operating out of a container in Cathedral Square.

properties.Name: Tīrama Mai (Tīrama Mai Sign)
properties.Description: The Tīrama Mai sign.

properties.Name: Tīrama Mai (Tīrama Mai Star)
properties.Description: Beautiful Tīrama Mai star.

properties.Name: Mitre 10: Ngā Kōrero Pakiwaitara (Mitre 10: Matariki story telling fire pit)
properties.Description: Warm up around the firepit while hearing stories about Matariki.

properties.Name: Te Pīatata o te Papa (Glowing grasses)
properties.Description: Magical lights pulse and glow, creating an amazing light show within the grasses.

properties.Name: Muramura te Mahara (Story Arch)
properties.Description: Hear the story of Matariki in this dazzling, immersive experience.

properties.Name: Kia Tūrama (Light fantastic)
properties.Description: Luminous light show bringing to life this Christchurch landmark, the old Rydges car park.

properties.Name: Te Karu Whātata (Star snapshot)
properties.Description: Look through the telescope to see the Matariki constellation.

properties.Name: Ngā Kapowai (Dragon flies)
properties.Description: Huge Dragonflies and reeds showing the connection between the stars and nature.

properties.Name: Matariki (3D Matariki animation)
properties.Description: Be amazed by this 3D animation of our Matariki characters, check out our panels to read the full story.

properties.Name: Kaihōpara o Te Tiri o Te Moana (Antarctic New Zealand explorer zone)
properties.Description: Explore the Antarctic, with amazing footage supplied by Anthony Powel. Come find out more about our amazing connection to Antarctica.

properties.Name: Te Whenua Tūrama (Field of lights)
properties.Description: Stunning installation in the shape of a kōru pulsing with colour and sound.

properties.Name: Te Tāpatu o te Mārama (Drum and light)
properties.Description: Come and play with the interactive drum and light display.

properties.Name: Te Poi o te Mārama (Suspended mirror ball)
properties.Description: Ball of light, refracting colour and light.

properties.Name: Te Turama o ngā Rākau (Lighting the trees)
properties.Description: A stunning backdrop to the riverside setting of the festival, created by lighting up the Avon River trees.

properties.Name: Ngao Matariki - Ka Tīaho, Ka Tūmanako (Sound cubes)
properties.Artist-company: Ariki Creative / Kommi Tamati-Elliffe / Art Fetiche
properties.Description: Our fantastic cubes are back and situated throughout the festival zone.

properties.Name: Ngao Matariki - Ka Tīaho, Ka Tūmanako (Sound cubes)
properties.Artist-company: Ariki Creative / Kommi Tamati-Elliffe / Art Fetiche
properties.Description: Our fantastic cubes are back and situated throughout the festival zone.

properties.Artist-company: Ariki Creative / Kommi Tamati-Elliffe / Art Fetiche

properties.Artist-company: Ariki Creative / Kommi Tamati-Elliffe / Art Fetiche

properties.Artist-company: Ariki Creative / Kommi Tamati-Elliffe / Art Fetiche
properties.Description: Our fantastic cubes are back and situated throughout the festival zone.

properties.Name: Explorer Zone
properties.Description: Check out one of the explorer zones and grab yourself something to eat or drink at Riverside.

properties.Name: Explorer Zone
properties.Description: Check out one of the explorer zones and check out the amazing art on offer at The Arts Centre.

properties.Name: Explorer Zone
properties.Description: Check out one of the explorer zones and grab yourself an ice cream or check out one of the restuarants on New Regent Street.

properties.Name: Explorer Zone
properties.Description: Check out one of the explorer zones and grab yourself something to eat or drink at Little High Eatery.

properties.Name: Ngao Matariki - Ka Tīaho, Ka Tūmanako (Sound cubes)
properties.Artist-company: Ariki Creative / Kommi Tamati-Elliffe / Art Fetiche
